C

com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration - package com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration
The Ooyala Pulse Integration framework.
createPulseSession(OoyalaPulseManager, Video, String, ContentMetadata, RequestSettings) - Method in interface com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration.OoyalaPulseManager.Listener
Requests the delegate to create a Pulse ad session, which contains information about all ads that should be played along with the current video context.

O

OoyalaPulseManager - Class in com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration
The Pulse Manager plugin allows you to display ads from Ooyala Pulse in the Ooyala Player.
OoyalaPulseManager(OoyalaPlayer) - Constructor for class com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration.OoyalaPulseManager
Initialize the Pulse Manager.
OoyalaPulseManager.Listener - Interface in com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration
The OoyalaPulseManager.Listener listener provides a way for the OoyalaPulseManager to communicate with the host application.
openClickThrough(OoyalaPulseManager, PulseVideoAd) - Method in interface com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration.OoyalaPulseManager.Listener
This method is called when tha app should show the clickthrough link.

S

setListener(OoyalaPulseManager.Listener) - Method in class com.ooyala.android.pulseintegration.OoyalaPulseManager
Set the object that will act as listener to the Pulse Manager.
